scripts.all: npm run client && npm run server
scripts.client: rm -rf _build/top && mkdir -p _build/top && refmt -parse re -print ml common.re > _build/top/common.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml exampleclient.re > _build/top/exampleclient.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/client.re > _build/top/client.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/web.re > _build/top/web.ml && cd _build/top && bsc -bs-package-name ReSocketIO -c -bs-files *.ml && ../../node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js exampleclient.js --output-file app.js
scripts.server: rm -rf _build/server && rm -f server.js exampleserver.js namespace.js client.js common.js && mkdir -p _build/server && refmt -parse re -print ml common.re > _build/server/common.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/client.re > _build/server/client.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/namespace.re > _build/server/namespace.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/server.re > _build/server/server.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml exampleserver.re > _build/server/exampleserver.ml && cd _build/server && bsc -c -bs-files *.ml && cp exampleserver.js ../../exampleserver.js && cp server.js ../../server.js && cp namespace.js ../../namespace.js && cp client.js ../../client.js && cp common.js ../../common.js
scripts.ocamldep: eval $(dependencyEnv) && nopam && ocamlfind ocamldep -pp node_modules/reason/refmt_impl.native -ml-synonym .re -mli-synonym .rei -modules -one-line src/exampleserver.re
